document.heading: DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA INTERSTATE BANKING ACT OF 1985 AMENDMENT ACT OF 1991, BILL 9-37

history.narrative: Law 9-42, the “District of Columbia Interstate Banking Act of 1985 Amendment Act of 1991,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-37, which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 4, 1991, and July 2, 1991, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 24, 1991, it was assigned Act No. 9-79 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
